mapper.sql: REGULATION_FLOW, REGULATION_NAME, REGULATION_CODE, REGULATION_CATEGORY_ID, REGULATION_CATEGORY_NAME, REGULATION_TYPE_ID, REGULATION_TYPE_NAME, FILE_FLOW, DEPT_FLOW, DEPT_NAME, REGULATION_YEAR, ORDINAL, REGULATION_REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW

select
distinct
from PUB_REGULATION
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PUB_REGULATION (REGULATION_FLOW, REGULATION_NAME, REGULATION_CODE, REGULATION_CATEGORY_ID, REGULATION_CATEGORY_NAME, REGULATION_TYPE_ID, REGULATION_TYPE_NAME, FILE_FLOW, DEPT_FLOW, DEPT_NAME, REGULATION_YEAR, ORDINAL, REGULATION_REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{regulationFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regulationRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
